item.title: Announcing The Continue Project (and a BIG Giveaway to Celebrate)
item.description: It’s time. Let’s talk about mental health as technologists. Watch the Announcement You can catch the full replay of the announcement (a little over 30 minutes) right here: Wanna skip to the good parts? Official Announcement Giveaway Details ($500+) What’s this all about then? We are developers, engineers, and technologists who recognize the importance of mental health in our lives and support each other with resources and space for discussion as colleagues and friends.
